couchPillow.name: Couch Pillow
couchPillow.description: The fabric is 100% cotton. It is filled with down and feather with a the filling weight of 25oz. It features a unique double layered fabric design and suited for use in indoor or outdoor shams.

bedPillow.name: Bed Pillow
bedPillow.description: Medium firmness typically designed for back and some side sleepers. Double layered fabric design providing the comfort you deserve. The outer fabric is 100% cotton. Fill with feather and down. This bed pillow giving you the right support.

floorPoufPillow.name: Floor Pouf Pillow
floorPoufPillow.description: Filled & Stuffed Floor Cushion. Yoga Pillow. Indian Vintage Kantha Saree Patchwork.

roundPillow.name: Round Pillow
roundPillow.description: Comfortable for the bed yet stylish for the living room. 5 lbs of 3D Microfiber filling. 100% Cotton zippered pillow case that is machine washable. 42 inches in Length by 9 inches in diameter.
